author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
This PR updates:
 - The 2023 MC realistic GTs
   - See this [CMSTalk post](https://cms-talk.web.cern.ch/t/mc-call-for-conditions-for-2023-mc/24376/21) for a full list of updates
 - New VtxSmearing for 2023 (`Realistic25ns13p6TeVEarly2023Collision`) included in #41719
 - The 2023 GEN-SIM PU library compatible with the 2023 BeamSpot
   - The samples have been produced by PdmV in [PDMVRELVALS-203](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/PDMVRELVALS-203)

GT differences:
 - **phase1_2023_realistic**: https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/131X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v7/131X_mcRun3_2023_realistic_v8
 - **phase1_2023_cosmics**: https://cms-conddb.cern.ch/cmsDbBrowser/diff/Prod/gts/131X_mcRun3_2023cosmics_realistic_deco_v7/131X_mcRun3_2023cosmics_realistic_deco_v8

#### PR validation:
Tested with:
`runTheMatrix.py -l 12434.0,12634.99 -j 8`
I will let the bot tests all the other workflows.

#### Backport:
Not a backport, but 13_1_X and 13_0_X will be provided soon
title: Update 2023 MC GT, VtxSmearing and PU library
